TEXT.English: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Welcome to Dawn Of The Overlords[NEWLINE] (Remastered) [NEWLINE]Advanced Civ [COLOR_REVERT]

[COLOR_MAGENTA]A Brief Mod History [COLOR_REVERT] Doto 2019 is a result of 12 years of thousands of civ4 hours that ive put over ther years. The mod has gone through many many changes and versions. [NEWLINE] My modding agenda is to give amod that enriches gameplay while conserving mod size in every aspect, for memory issues, as well as multiplayer friendly. its about enjoy a rich mod in a small package. This current version is named Doto Remastred and it is a ModMod for the magnificant F1rpo mod - [COLOR_MAGENTA]Advanced Civ (v095)[COLOR_REVERT]. you can see the mod readme and my civfanatics thread for information. [NEWLINE] Thanks to all the Modders over the years and f1rpo for the increddible support [NEWLINE] Enjoy and dont forget to leave a comment on my thread :) [NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Keldath the friendly modder[COLOR_REVERT] [NEWLINE] These mods were also created by me over the years: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET] DUNE WARS [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET] BARSOOM [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET] SONG OF THE MOOD 2 [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET] EMPIRE OF LIBERTY [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] HAVE FUN Y'ALL!:)
